recipe_name: Cinnamon French toast with honey, cream and orange
author: James Tanner
method: Whisk the egg, milk, sugar and cinnamon together in a bowl until well combined, then soak the bread slices in the mixture. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the bread slices and fry for 1-2 minutes on both sides, or until golden-brown all over.  To serve, arrange the orange slices on a serving plate, place the toast on top and dust with icing sugar. Drizzle over the honey and cream.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg,  150ml/5fl oz milk,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  Â½ tsp ground cinnamon,  2 slices white bread,  25g/1oz butter,  1 orange, peeled and sliced,  icing sugar, for dusting,  2 tbsp clear honey,  3 tbsp double cream
